name: Gautam Sharma
summary:
Gautam Sharma, a 34 year old financial analyst originally from Mumbai, India now living in Los Angeles, is looking to find a life partner. As a straight male with South Asian ethnicity and respect for his Hindu faith, he values honesty, communication, and respect. Fluent in English, Hindi, and Marathi, he enjoys traveling, hitting the gym and reading.

Currently, Gautam does not have any children, but hopes to have some in the future. He enjoys an active lifestyle and prefers an occasional drink, while abstaining from smoking, marijuana and drugs. Based on his preference, a suitable partner would be a straight woman between the ages of 25-35, who leads an active lifestyle, enjoys moderate drinking, and does not smoke. Future children is something he hopes for in a relationship, indicating that he is looking for a long-term commitment.
